representation_information.name: Open Packaging Conventions (Office Open XML), ISO 29500-2:2008-2012
representation_information.description: A bundling format designed to contain a collection of files (termed "parts") that represent a single logical whole. The OPC specification is part 2 of ISO/IEC 29500, Information technology -- Document description and processing languages -- Office Open XML File Formats (OOXML).

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
